meanings.sent1: The psychic claimed to have extrasensory abilities.
meanings.sent2: She believed in the existence of extrasensory perception.
meanings.sent3: The cat's extrasensory reaction to the approaching storm was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: His extrasensory intuition was like a sixth sense guiding him through life.
meanings.sent5: The extrasensory experience left a lasting impression on her mind.

meanings.definition: Receiving or perceiving information beyond the ordinary senses
meanings.sent1: Some people claim to possess extrasensory perception.
meanings.sent2: The mysterious woman had an extrasensory ability to predict the future.
meanings.sent3: His extrasensory knowledge of the surprise party was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her extrasensory insight into people's emotions was uncanny.
meanings.sent5: The extrasensory message seemed to come from another world.

meanings.definition: Relating to perception or communication outside the five senses
meanings.sent1: The paranormal investigator explored the realm of extrasensory communication.
meanings.sent2: The study of extrasensory phenomena intrigued many scientists.
meanings.sent3: The dog's extrasensory reaction to the doorbell was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: Their extrasensory connection transcended physical boundaries.
meanings.sent5: The extrasensory bond between twins was truly remarkable.
